title: Redemption
description: This is a heart warming novel about a small town Tennessee girl Sara and a Silicon valley self made billionaire, Darren. Darren is type cast in the standard rich guy mold by all except those close too him but Sara reveals unexpected depths to him that makes her develop feelings for him. Both Sara and Darren have heavy pasts and carry emotional baggage that influences their relationship and feelings for one another. Set in a contemporary world story introduces meaningful characters that will at the same time touch your heart, amuse you and have you rooting for them. Will Sara and Darren be able to bridge the almost unsurmountable hurdles in station, outlook and adversity? How will they conquer their own fears and failings to find happiness again?
author: Victoria  Price
